formatted_address: 3500 Bukit Merah Central, Inside Sports Lifestyle Center, Singapore 159837
name: Kampong Cafe

reviews.text:
not gonna lie, one of the best fish and chip, hot, soft on the inside, crispy on the outside and it is really tasty and worth the money! the staff there are all friendly and nice, give nice amount of fries and coleslaw.

while typing this, iâ€™m craving for some fish and chips HAHAHHA would come here again ofc and recommend to my friends. brought my mom to came here also and she love the food here, itâ€™s very peaceful here.

variety of food as you can see from the menu, during lunch time on weekdays theres crowd because nearby theres a lot of office and office workers came here to eat but thereâ€™s plenty of seats!!

I ordered six coin prata with standard chicken curry (without the chicken) for $3.50. The curry was thick, which I liked, slightly spicy but not overpowering, and paired well with the prata. The prata was beautifully presentedâ€”crispy on the outside and doughy on the inside, making it quite enjoyable. However, the kopi-o gao kosong was disappointing as it tasted diluted and lacked punch.

I ordered Kampong fried chicken, the price is $10. Taste is ok only , no salt and too much oily. Only good thing is chicken portion was large.
Tea halia - below average.
Are you serious 2 parota $10 lol ðŸ˜‚

This eatery recently took over the unit vacated by Cheval/Chi Bao. Apparently, it was a tenant about six years ago. The menu is impressively diverse, consisting of Chinese Zi Char, Western food and Indian cuisine. Staff was friendly. I only had a teh halia, which was not bad. Overall, a cosy (and interesting because it is beside a swimming pool) environment to have a meal.

Price of Food is on the high side but portion is above  average.
Fried rice is tasty.
Prata is crispy but the internal is a little undercooked.

Teh halia is not using fresh ginger juice. Won't recommend to order.

Aircon dining area  is available but the food smell lingers after u finished dining .

Outdoor area is very warm.

vicinity: 3500 Bukit Merah Central, Inside Sports Lifestyle Center
